import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
m = int(sys.stdin.readline())
a = [int(sys.stdin.readline()) for i in range(n)]

max_k = max(a)
min_k = max_k + m

print(min_k, max_k)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
m = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
benches = []
for i in range(n):
    benches.append(int(sys.stdin.readline().strip()))
benches.sort(reverse=True)

min_k = benches[0]
max_k = benches[0]
for i in range(m):
    benches[0] += 1
    benches.sort(reverse=True)
    min_k = min(min_k, benches[0])
    max_k = max(max_k, benches[0])

print(min_k, max_k)
